title: Yummy Hotdog
description: Yummy Hotdog is a cooking game to make your delicious hotdog from scratch. Get the materials and ingredients you needed. Start mixing them and getting your batter ready. Control everything, garnish with sauce, and add toppings to make your hotdog even tastier. Finish your perfect hotdog and unlock all the achievements of the game! You should also check another food-making game from the same developer inYummy Waffle Ice Cream.
